intro: Calotis polyseta, commonly known as the silverleaf daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its silver-gray foliage and bright yellow flowers that bloom in spring. The plant belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies, sunflowers, and thistles. Calotis polyseta typically grows in well-drained soils and prefers full sun exposure. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant for its attractive appearance and drought tolerance.
